summary: This is an email chain from August 13, 2019, between FBI personnel discussing a request from the Deputy Director (DD) for a summary on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend. The emails coordinate providing background information and scheduling an interview with her.

persons.name: Supervisory Special Agent
persons.role: FBI/NYPD Violent Crimes Task Force Agent
persons.context: The sender of the final email in the chain, providing an update on the status of information regarding Epstein's girlfriend and a planned interview.

persons.name: Special Agent in Charge
persons.role: Special Agent in Charge, Criminal Division, FBI New York Office
persons.context: Forwarded a request from the Assistant Director to the Supervisory Special Agent, asking for information on Epstein's girlfriend.

persons.name: Assistant Director in Charge
persons.role: Assistant Director in Charge, FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The original requester, asking the Special Agent in Charge for a short summary on Epstein's girlfriend, including her background and interview timeline.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: Referred to in the context of his death and his 'girlfriend', who is the subject of the FBI's inquiry.

connections.description: Epstein is referred to as having a 'girlfriend' who is now a subject of FBI inquiry following his death.
The Assistant Director makes a request for information to the Special Agent in Charge.
The Special Agent in Charge forwards a request for information to the Supervisory Special Agent.

events.title: FBI Coordination on Epstein Girlfriend Inquiry
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails to coordinate providing a summary on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend to address questions from the Deputy Director (DD). An interview with her is tentatively scheduled for that Friday.

events.title: Epstein's Death
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's death is referenced as a past event, with the inquiry into his girlfriend occurring afterward.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively seeking information on Jeffrey Epstein's girlfriend in August 2019, shortly after his death.
A Deputy Director (DD) of the FBI requested a short summary on the girlfriend's background and a timeline for a future interview.
An interview with Epstein's girlfriend was tentatively scheduled for Friday, August 16, 2019.
The email chain indicates coordination between the Assistant Director in Charge, Special Agent in Charge, and a Supervisory Special Agent in the FBI's New York office.
